mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_bbs_key, reply_writer, reply_contents) value ( #{reply_bbs_key}, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_contents})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents=#{reply_contents}, reply_udate=now() where reply_key=#{reply_key}
update reply set reply_lock=#{reply_lock} where reply_key=#{reply_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from reply where reply_bbs_key=#{reply_bbs_key} ;
mapper.update: update reply set reply_reaction=#{reply_reaction} where reply_key=#{reply_key};
